          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Floating in heavy liquids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwimmen in schwere Flüssigkeiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Flotter dans les liquides lourds</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Flutuar em líquidos pesados</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Galleggiando nei liquidi pesanti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να επιπλεύσει στα βαριά υγρά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Flotación en líquidos pesados</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that by adding sugar to water, it is easier for the tube to float.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">floating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sugar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">test tube</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß, indem man Zucker 
Wasser hinzufügt, es einfacher für das Gefäß ist zu schwimmen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve qu'en ajoutant le sucre
à l'eau, il est plus facile que le tube flotte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que adicionando o 
açúcar à água, é mais fácil para o tubo flutuar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che aggiungendo lo 
zucchero all'acqua, è più facile affinchè il tubo galleggi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι με την προσθήκη της 
ζάχαρης στο ύδωρ, είναι ευκολότερο για το σωλήνα να επιπλεύσει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que agregando el 
azúcar al agua, es más fácil que el tubo flote.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwimmen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
